Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: J. Raymond
Reviews.Content: the items received were exaclty as described.  This was a replacemetn purchase of an older digital Canon that died.  I am very happy with the new one, the process for ordering and the delivery timing

Reviews.Title: Great little camera that takes really good pics
Reviews.Author: midwest gal
Reviews.Content: I really like this little camera & all the accesseries it came with.  It is so little I can take it with me anywhere.

ProductInfo.Features:
PowerShot ELPH 130 IS Red 16MP Digital Camera with WiFi and 8x Opt. Zoom
16GB Secure Digital SD Memory Card
Ultra-Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case - DP15
NB-11L Replacement Battery For PowerShot A2300,A2400,A3400,A4000,110HSE,320HSE
Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod, 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS Red 16MP Digital Camera 16GB Bundle - Includes camera, 16GB Secure Digital SD Memory Card, Ultra-Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case, NB-11L Replacement Battery, Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod, and Cleaning Kit
